name: Phitter
tagline: Simple Twitter client written in PHP using the Symfony2 Console component
body:
### Phitter!
Phitter is a simple PHP based command line Twitter client using v1.1 of the Twitter API. This was built as an experiment in building command line apps in PHP using the Symfony2 Console component.

### Install
Either clone the repository from the [project page](http://www.github.com/Bendihossan/Phitter) or use [packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/bendihossan/phitter).

### Author
Phitter is written by [Bendihossan](http://github.com/Bendihossan).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
